mapper.select: SELECT id, code, name, unified_social_credit_code, bank_account_info, contact_person, phone, address, status, remark, created_at, updated_at FROM supplier ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO supplier (code, name, unified_social_credit_code, bank_account_info, contact_person, phone, address, status, remark) VALUES (#{code}, #{name}, #{unifiedSocialCreditCode}, #{bankAccountInfo}, #{contactPerson}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{status}, #{remark})
